::Seeker::
Seekker continuedto stare out the window.
"OOH...Pretty lights flashing....hehe ....boom!" he screamed the last 
part after alrge flash erupted from the light show...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Axis/Lokk::
> 
> Lokk frowns at Seekker, and turns back to the control panel. He 
> presses a few buttons and another holo appears, this time of Earth. 
> "This is Earth." he says to his companions, "This place looks more 
> inviting than the other planet we were headed too, lets stop here." 
> Axis agrees with him "Yup yup,"
> 
>
